title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the VRCombatTraining system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the VRCombatTraining project. This includes the VR environment, simulation engine, integration with hardware components, networking, data management, and ensures scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. Additionally, consider edge cases, error handling, documentation, and accessibility features to make the system usable by a wide range of users. Also, explore the potential for real-time multiplayer capabilities. Upon completion, prepare a comprehensive technical design document for further development. In case of any uncertainties or suggestions for further tasks, raise new RFCs.

title: VR Environment Development
description: Develop the virtual reality environment, including terrain, graphics, and physics simulations.

title: Combat Simulation Engine
description: Develop the combat simulation engine, including weapon models, ballistics, and AI for enemy behavior.

title: Hardware Integration
description: Integrate the VR system with various hardware components, such as VR headsets, motion controllers, and haptic feedback devices.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a scalable and efficient database schema for storing user data, scenarios, simulation results, and related metadata. Ensure data integrity, performance, and normalization techniques are applied. Implement data access layers and APIs for interacting with the database. Additionally, consider sharding strategies for handling large volumes of data and implementing caching mechanisms for improved performance.

title: Security and Access Control (Revised)
description: Implement comprehensive security measures including: user authentication, AES-256 data encryption, Role-Based Access Control, secure communication protocols (TLS/SSL), compliance with industry standards such as GDPR, HIPAA, and PCI-DSS. Prioritize privacy, resilience, and scalability. Collaborate closely with other teams for seamless integration. Revise the implementation plan to include a multi-factor authentication mechanism for added security. Ensure that the system can handle increased load during peak usage periods (scalability). Provide regular updates on progress and potential challenges to the project manager.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user manuals, installation guides, and developer documentation.

title: Deployment and Maintenance
description: Plan and implement the deployment strategy, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, and maintenance procedures.
